title: Interpretation of baldness in a dream and baldness in a dream

preview.html: Seeing baldness for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, baldness in the front of the head for women, seeing baldness for girls, a gap in the hair, baldness for Ibn Sirin. Baldness. Seeing baldness in a dream is a good vision if the vision is for a bald man. It is not good to see a bald woman in a dream, because this It indicates worries and fatigue, and this is of course because hair is a woman’s adornment, her beauty, and her crown. Seeing an unmarried girl or an unmarried woman seeing that her hair is falling out and that she has become bald in a dream indicates major psychological problems that the girl is going through, psychological distress, and a feeling of depression. This must be expressed and come out of that. Feeling and emotion through contentment and contemplation of existence, contentment and self-confidence. Seeing empty hair in a single girl’s dream symbolizes emotional emptiness and a feeling of hopelessness and hopelessness, and accordingly, scholars said that when a person has this kind of feeling, he should turn to Almighty God and pray To overcome these psychological feelings. Crises and practicing sports and social activities. As for a married woman who sees herself bald or her hair falling out, this symbolizes the difficult and harsh circumstances that the woman is going through. The best vision is for a married woman to see that everyone around her does not care about her appearance while she is bald and is not afraid of her and they treat her in a very natural way. Especially in treating the husband. As this vision portends the end and death of all concerns and problems of permission, and the interpretation of a married woman’s baldness applies to a pregnant woman or a divorced woman or a widow. Seeing a bald man in a man’s dream is a good thing, while seeing a bald woman in a man’s dream is repulsive, because it symbolizes life’s problems and worries and the cruelty of the world. A man who sees an ugly bald woman in his dream symbolizes failure, brokenness, and strong problems that he will go through. It is undesirable for a man to see himself in his dream as marrying a bald woman, and it is also not good for a man to see himself sitting, accompanying, or walking. With a bald woman. The best vision is for a man to leave and run away from a bald woman. Seeing a bald woman attacking or chasing a man in a dream symbolizes the difficult challenges that a man will face in the future. It is also not good to see a man eating from a bald woman, as this symbolizes Misfortunes, problems, and worries, God forbid. In general, we can summarize that seeing baldness in men is a welcome thing in a dream, while seeing baldness in women and women is extremely annoying and hateful. Seeing it in a dream, whether it is a man or a woman in the dream, as well as in both In both cases, it symbolizes that the person will get into trouble, suffer from his worries, and face great and difficult challenges on his journey to achieve it. Objective: Interpretation of baldness in a dream YouTube. Interpretation of seeing bald - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing a tree without leaves in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of climbing a tree without leaves in a dream When you are looking for an interpretation of a dream that you are climbing a tree without leaves in a dream, one of the dreams is very disturbing, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must forbid and disbelieve the absolute because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach The fact is that it can make mistakes and can hit, in addition, the site and its administrators have nothing to do with the site. Interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about climbing a tree without leaves in a dream. A dream about climbing a tree without leaves may indicate some difficult things that the dreamer is facing in his life at that time. If someone is seen climbing a tree without leaves in a dream, this may indicate difficult days that the dreamer is going through and must One has to be careful. In the case of a dream of climbing trees that have no leaves, this may indicate the dreamer’s bad luck and suffering during this period. A person’s dream that he was climbing a tree but it had no leaves indicates the bad changes that are occurring in his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a tree in a dream: Anyone who dreams of climbing a tall tree may indicate the happiness and joys that the dreamer will feel in his life at that time. Dreaming about climbing trees in a dream may indicate happy events that come to the dreamer during this period. Climbing trees in a dream can indicate To the honor that the dreamer will receive and a lot of pride. If one sees himself climbing a tree in a dream, this may indicate the will and determination that the dreamer had in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the rising of the moon in a dreamIt is possible that seeing the moon As it rises in a dream, it indicates that he is a just person who loves goodness for everyone. If one sees himself climbing the moon in a dream, this may indicate many happy things happening in his life at that time. Seeing the moon rising in a dream could mean good changes Which are happening in your life these days. Seeing the moon rising in a dream means getting rid of the worry and anxiety that the dreamer was suffering from at that time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing the Kaaba in a dream: Seeing someone climbing the roof of the Kaaba may indicate good skin that the dreamer will acquire during these days. It is possible that seeing someone climbing the Kaaba in a dream indicates the dreamer’s sins and he must repent and approach God, Blessed and Most High. Standing On the roof of the Kaaba in a dream may indicate some stumbles and obstacles in one’s life during this time, and God knows best. A person’s dream that he was standing at the door of the Kaaba may indicate the abundance of goodness that he will obtain in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a large rock In a dream: Climbing a large rock in a dream may indicate working hard to achieve goals and ambitions during this time. Seeing yourself climbing a large rock in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s achievements in life during this period. A person’s dream that he was climbing a large rock in a dream may indicate A promotion at work or a position that the visionary will acquire

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating cabbage in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing eating cabbage in a dream means failed projects and other interpretations that we will explain to a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as eating cooked cabbage or eating green, white, or red. And eating cabbage according to Ibn Sirin and others: Interpretation of eating cabbage in a dream. If you see a cabbage garden in a dream, this means that you will face negative and failed real estate deals, or that buying a property or a house will bring you troubles and problems. If you see that you are eating cabbage in a dream, this means that you will face Problems with some family members. If you see yourself cooking cabbage, this means there are health problems with your teeth, and eating cabbage in a dream indicates bad relationships with family members. Interpretation of cabbage in a dream by Ibn Sirin Cabbage or cabbage is a rude, rough Bedouin, so whoever sees the energy of cabbage in his hand , he asks for something that he sees only with rudeness and rudeness. Seeing cabbage in a dream, eating it and growing it, and other indications, in the dream of an unmarried woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman in a man’s dream. The respected sheikh and scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin said in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams in the Chapter on Sowing The grain is that cabbage symbolizes a coarse person and the one who sees in his hand the energy of a cabbage (cabbage stalk). Cabbage plant), and this indicates that he strongly desires something and seeks it, and seeing cabbage seeds symbolizes children, and planting cabbage shows healing, relief, or religiosity and piety. Interpretation of a dream about cabbage in a dream for a single woman. Seeing cabbage in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the girl’s desire for secrecy. And to preserve her privacy and secrets and not reveal them, even to the people closest to her. A girl sees in her dream that she is buying cabbage. This indicates that she has many friendships and relationships, and that she is a social person and does not pay attention to the trivial things that some people make. Cabbage symbolizes a rude, rude man who loves money and trade, and indicates a miserable man in an unmarried woman’s dream. The best vision is to see a single woman cooking or eating cabbage. Interpretation of cabbage in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman who sees cabbage in a dream, this means livelihood or money that she gains, but after patience, effort and toil. It is praiseworthy, because it heralds the recovery of a sick woman or her recovery from aches or pains, and cabbage can symbolize a rude, stubborn, or stubborn husband. Interpretation of cabbage in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman seeing cabbage in a dream may symbolize her pregnancy with a male child and also indicates the ease of childbirth without problems or problems. Difficulties, God willing. Interpretation of cabbage in a dream for a man. As for seeing cabbage in a man’s dream, it symbolizes money, investment, or profitable trade, and seeing cabbage in his dream is green, fresh, praiseworthy, and symbolizes blessing, and the best vision is to see cabbage eating it, cooking it, or harvesting it in a dream. Interpretation White cabbage and green cabbage in a dream. As for the different colors of cabbage, each color has its own meaning in life.

title: Secrets of interpreting a dream about henna by Ibn Sirin in good and evil

preview.html: In the following article, we will explain to you what is the interpretation of a dream about henna in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Knowing what it means and what it indicates, dream interpretation scholars say that the interpretation of this vision varies according to the social status of the sleeping person, henna in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about henna in a dream by Ibn SirinThe great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says that if a woman dreams of putting henna on her hand, this is a good vision that portends the coming of happy events and hearing good news in the very near future. Seeing henna on the hand in a dream symbolizes a feeling of comfort, calm, peace of mind, and the removal of worries and anxiety. Seeing yourself dyeing your hair with henna in a dream indicates that the dreamer's circumstances will change for the better. If the dreamer suffers from problems and worries, and sees henna in his dream, this is a good vision that portends the coming of comfort, getting rid of distress, and removing worries. Interpretation of seeing henna in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees henna engravings in her dream, this is a vision that heralds her marriage in the near future. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing henna engravings in an unmarried girl's dream symbolizes travel. However, if an unmarried girl sees henna engravings in her dream, then it appears Ugly and she did not like it, this is a sign of her marriage to a person who causes her unhappiness and sadness, and she must think a lot before choosing her life. Partner. If an unmarried girl dreams of putting henna on her hair, this is a vision that conceals. Applying henna to the hair in an unmarried girl's dream means that she will achieve the dreams she seeks. Interpretation of a dream about henna in the hair of a married woman If a married woman dreams that she is putting henna, this is a good vision that portends the coming of happy events and happy occasions. Seeing bad and ugly henna patterns in a married woman's dream is an unpleasant vision that carries bad connotations and indicates the emergence of many problems for the dreamer's family. As for if a married woman dreams of putting henna on her hair, this is a vision that portends family stability, reassurance, a happy life and contentment. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing henna in a married woman's dream indicates that she will soon become pregnant. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand of a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is putting henna on her hair, this is a good vision that portends an easy and trouble-free birth. Seeing henna in a pregnant woman's dream symbolizes the end of the problems and pains she suffers from. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is removing henna, this is an unpleasant vision, and indicates the arrival of worries and problems And sorrows in her life. If a pregnant woman sees a lot of henna in her dream, this is a sign that God will give birth to a male child. Interpretation of seeing henna in a dream for a man If a man sees in a dream that he is putting henna on his hair, this is a vision that promises him to hear news that brings joy to his heart. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing henna in a man’s dream indicates a change in the dreamer’s circumstances for the better. If a man sees in a dream that he is putting henna on his

title: Interpretation of the number 5 in a dream: Seeing the number five in a dream

preview.html: The dream number five indicates marriage, balance, and other interpretations that we will interpret for unmarried girls, married women, pregnant women, divorcees, and men, such as seeing the number fifty or five hundred or the numbers “- 50-55- 5000-500 – 5” or the number five thousand with the number 5000, or a dream of 5 dinars, or five riyals, or the number 500, or five thousand dinars, and more clarifications to complete the topic: Interpretation of the number five in a dream Dream interpretation lawyers say that seeing the number five in a dream is evidence of a balance of emotions, affection, health, and money, so seeing the number five is one One of the praiseworthy visions in a man's dream. One of the five pillars of Islam. Vision number five 5: indicates doubt about religion, as God Almighty says: (And they say five, and the sixth is their dog, they stone the unseen). The number five in a dream may indicate separation between spouses, according to God Almighty’s saying (every five, if He curses him). God, even if he is one of the liars) and may indicate the pillars of Islam. The number five in the dictionary of dream interpretation is the rule that expresses four balances in life, which are (passion, work, health, and money). Seeing the number five in a dream indicates general balances and confirms the viewer’s happiness and sense of satisfaction and perfection. The number five refers to the five pillars of Islam and often refers to the five obligatory prayers, whether he leaves them or maintains them. The number five in a pregnant woman’s dream can refer to the first five months of pregnancy or the remaining five weeks of it. An unmarried woman’s dream may indicate an engagement period lasting five years. Years or that the marriage takes place after five months, etc. Seeing the number 5, five in a dream indicates what is invisible, that is, it conveys a message to the dreamer that the future is in God’s hands and that no one can chart your path for you or reveal the mysteries to you. From the future, and thinking excessively and exhaustingly about knowing what will come is useless, so trust in God and hand over your matter to God and ask Him for help. The number five in a dream indicates that you are a person who has a desire that has passed for a long time and has not been fulfilled, but when you see the number five, know That the long-standing desire will come true for you now. The number five indicates other meanings. For example, it indicates the happiness and joy that the dreamer will experience in the coming period, God willing, and this is general for all people. The number five. For an unmarried girl, it indicates marriage soon when she sees this vision. God willing, the Blessed and Most High. Of course, the matter is in the near future, which does not mean tomorrow, but rather in the near future. The number five in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the nearness of childbirth and indicates good health for her and her fetus, God willing, the Blessed and Most High. Interpretation of the number five in a man’s dream. As for seeing the number Five in the dream of an unmarried young man, it means marriage after five days, five months, or five years, but seeing the number five written on the wall is a warning to the man that there are some obstacles and problems in his life that he must overcome and get rid of in order to start a new life. Interpretation of the vision

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream complete, and what does this mean for men and women?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a sick person in a complete dream? Questions are often asked about this vision. Many people dream of a sick person or the illness of a family member or loved one. The term hospital in a dream refers to different things than seeing a person with cancer in a complete dream or seeing a patient dying in a complete dream and seeing illness in general in a complete dream – always a bad dream that can frighten the dreamer, and today you will learn together all the correct and reasonable interpretations related to the interpretation of sleep. Patient is one of the dream interpretation experts and scholars, if you are interested in the interpretation. You should follow the article.Seeing a cancer patient in a dreamScientists and interpreters say that seeing a person with cancer in a dream full is one of the unpleasant visions that does not bode well. Cancer is a serious and dangerous disease and its presence in the dreamer’s dream indicates that calamities and misfortunes will happen to the dreamer and he must change and get closer to God once he knows God better. See also: Why does the dream of seeing illness in a dream come true? Seeing a sick relative in a dream To see in a dream every member of the family or Relatives or a husband and wife afflicted with a disease indicate the love and affection that exists between him and the patient in the dream, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a window in a dream

preview.html: We offer you the interpretation of a window in a dream, and windows are one of the main parts of the house, and you cannot imagine a house without a window, as it is important for bringing sunlight into the house, as well as for ventilation. Through the following lines from today’s article from Encyclopedia, we will learn together about the different circumstances of the window in a dream and what dream interpretation scholars have said about it, so follow us. Interpretation of a window in a dream The meaning of seeing windows in a dream Imam Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees in a dream that he is looking out of the window and the view that he sees He is not satisfied with himself and feels disgusted by seeing it, then this dream indicates the problems that the viewer faces. If one sees that he is looking out his window and sees the sea, this means that he will have a job opportunity in a far away place and he will travel to it. If one looks out the window and sees endless desert and sand To her, this dream symbolizes the loneliness that the dreamer feels. One of the bad dreams is for someone to see in a dream that he is looking out the window, and his window was looking at the graves, because this dream means that the dreamer will die. If the window faces the graves, that person will fall ill. Some commentators say that a large window that brings sunlight into the house indicates a good, righteous woman present in a man’s life. If the window is narrow and small, this is a warning to him that he knows a woman of bad character and he should stay away from her. Interpretation of a dream about exiting from a narrow window: Exiting from a window in a dream indicates that you are afraid of confrontation and worried about the future. It also symbolizes his fear of confronting a specific person. If the window from which he exits is narrow, this means that he is trying to escape from the problems he faces in his life and does not want to enter into confrontations with the other parts of the problem. Interpretation of a dream about closing a window in front of a single woman: One of the bad dreams for an unmarried girl is that she dreams that she is closing one of the windows of her house and this The dream indicates that she will end her engagement if she gets engaged, and if she is in a relationship, this indicates that she will break up with her lover. Because closing a window in a dream means ending a situation in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of removing a window in a dream: A married man, whether a man or a woman, and dreaming of removing one of the windows of his house is an unwanted vision, as it indicates that there are serious disagreements between the spouses, and that they cannot resolve these matters. Problems and they end up in divorce. We advise anyone who sees this vision to make a greater effort with his partner to find solutions to these problems before they separate and lead to divorce. Cleaning a window in a dream Cleaning windows in a dream is a praiseworthy vision, but its interpretation varies depending on the dreamer’s condition. Whoever sees that he is cleaning a window in his house, The dreamer commits sins and transgressions. This dream is good news from God Almighty for him to repent to God Almighty, abandon these sins and purify his life from their impurity, and God Almighty will guide him in his worship and insist on obedience. If the dreamer of this dream is suffering from competition or a problem in his life, then this dream means that he will solve these problems. And stay away from anything

title: Secrets of interpreting the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Here in this article, Jami explains the Prophet in a dream in detail. Going to the Prophet’s Mosque and praying there is the dream of all Muslims around the world. The vision wakes up with joy, hoping that this dream means that God will achieve what He wants for her, but is this vision considered one of the real visions or is it a subjective conversation about the dreamer’s many wishes that it will come true? We know all this through the interpretation of the dream of an unmarried girl in the Prophet’s Mosque. In the following lines in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream for a single woman. The dream interpreter, Ibn Sirin, says that if an unmarried girl sees the Prophet’s Mosque in her dream, then her dream indicates that she will soon marry a person with good morals. This dream may indicate that her life The dreamer will change for the better and that God Almighty will grant her happiness and she will be able to achieve what she seeks. Dream interpretation scholar Ibn Shaheen says that seeing the Prophet’s Mosque in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that her affairs will ease in the near future. Whoever sees the Prophet’s Mosque in her dream, her dream indicates That God will bless her in her life and may give her the opportunity to travel soon. This vision may indicate that there is a lot of good food on the way to her. If the owner of the vision is looking for a job, then the vision is good news for her that God will soon give her a job opportunity. If the girl is not... When a married woman sees the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream, it means that God will marry her to a religious young man with good morals. An unmarried girl who listens to the Holy Qur’an in the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream or listens to a religious lecture in it means that her marriage will take place soon. When an unmarried woman sees in Her dream is that she is digging a hole in the Prophet’s Mosque, this means that her marriage will be imminent. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the Prophet’s Mosque for single women. An unmarried woman’s washing in the Prophet’s Mosque while preparing to pray in a dream is evidence of the imminence of her marriage. This vision also indicates that God will fulfill all of the vision’s desires And that he will respond to her prayers that she always addressed to him. If the dreamer is engaged and dreams that she is praying inside the Prophet’s Mosque, then the dream indicates the approaching marriage. An unmarried girl who prays in the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream symbolizes that there is something that worries and worries the viewer, but she will feel comfortable and reassured. To him. This vision also shows that its owner has a good reputation and a medical reputation among everyone around her. Seeing the green dome of the Prophet’s Mosque in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the green dome of the Prophet’s Mosque, then her dream indicates that she is satisfied with what God has commanded for her and that God May God protect her in her life. A single girl’s dream that she is helping build this dome indicates that she enjoys stability and has high ambitions. To interpret another dream in an encyclopedia, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application. It may also read: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet’s Mosque. Interpretation of the Prophet’s Mosque In a dream.

preview.html: But in the interpretation of a dream about a washing machine, there are many clues that explain to the opinion the message that the interpretation gives, and in order not to prolong it, we will show you from our website the interpreter of each interpretation of this. The dream depends on each case. Interpretation of seeing a washing machine in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a washing machine in Manan for an unmarried girl is an indication of the changes occurring in her life. It can be said that the interpretation of a dream about spinning a washing machine in a dream for a single girl, its meaning lies in hearing good news. Seeing clean clothes coming out From the washing machine in a dream symbolizes one girl. She is a good girl and loves to participate with others in their events. While seeing clothes placed in the washing machine and seeing clothes washed in the dream of the Virgin Mary. A sign of the approaching date of her wedding, God willing. And when an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the washing machine is spinning Quickly. This vision may indicate that you will find a new job or position, thanks to God Almighty. Seeing laundry in the washing machine in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates success and excellence, whether at work or in study. Interpretation of seeing dirty clothes before putting them in the washing machine in an unmarried girl’s dream For a married woman, it indicates some of the problems and worries that enter her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about washing clothes for a divorced woman. Interpretation of a dream about a washing machine in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a washing machine in a married woman’s dream is one of the dreams that brings goodness to the dreamer, because it indicates calm and stability. While If a married woman sees herself washing clothes in a dream, this is a sign that the worries that were in her life are gone. And the dream of dirty clothes entering the washing machine in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the end of the problems that occurred between her and her husband, thanks to God Almighty. It is said that seeing a washing machine in A dream of a married woman indicates the strength of the dreamer’s character. If a married woman saw that she was washing her children’s clothes in a washing machine in a dream. The vision may mean the approaching date of pregnancy, God willing. If a married woman moved laundry from one place to another in a dream, a change will occur in the dreamer’s life. He washes the clothes and then spreads them on the line, and their scent is in the married woman’s sleep. It is a token of her good reputation among the people. Interpretation of a dream about a washing machine in a dream for a man and its meaning. A dream about a washing machine in a married man’s dream is facilitating the situation in which he lives, thanks to God Almighty. While seeing the old washing machine replaced with a new one in A married man’s dream indicates a transition from a state of poverty to a better state, God willing. A married man washes his wife’s clothes in a washing machine in a dream. It is a sign that he is a person revealing some personal secrets and that God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a new washing machine in a married man’s dream indicates improvement. In the dreamer’s life. If a married man sees that he is moving a washing machine in a dream, and he has some marital problems in his life. The vision may mean the end of these problems that the dreamer was facing. It has been said by some modern commentators that seeing a washing machine in a married man’s dream. We refer to changes The positivity that happens to him thanks to God Almighty

title: Interpretation of mice in a dream

preview.html: There are those who feel intense chills when they see them, and we are talking about seeing mice in a dream today from gptafser.com/ in detail. The interpretation of seeing mice in a dream for one girl and the unmarried girl who sees mice in her sleep. It is evidence of her fear of something or her unwillingness to make a certain decision in the future. Her life, and God knows best. As for the only girl who sees herself hitting mice in a dream. This dream shows that she has a strong language in relationships with others and she must wait and change herself so that others do not hate her. Seeing hitting and killing mice in one girl’s dream is a metaphor for her victory over the enemy. The girl Who continues to study or work and dreams of seeing a black mouse in a dream, this indicates failure, and God knows best. Seeing a black mouse in the house of an unmarried girl in a dream is a symbol of the distress and anguish that the household is suffering from, and God knows best. As for the appearance of white mice in the girl’s dream For an unmarried woman, it is a sign of weakness, weakness, and the end of distress and success. Seeing a white mouse in the bed of an unmarried girl is a sign of the fortuneteller’s approaching marriage. And an engaged girl who sees a red mouse is a sign that the engagement is broken and not consummated. However, if he sees a white and beautiful mouse, it is a metaphor. To determine the date of marriage, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about many mice. Interpretation of seeing mice in a dream for a married woman. Seeing mice in a married woman’s dream is a warning to her. There is a malicious woman in her life who is trying to get close to her, but in reality it is a plot and God knows best. But when she sees a married woman In a dream, there is a black rat, then this dream indicates the presence of crises or difficulties. When a black rat is killed in a married woman’s dream, this means that the woman has been relieved of all her troubles, and God knows best. Seeing white mice in a married woman’s dream is a metaphor for good news and good luck. If a married woman sees small mice in her dream, this indicates that there are enemies in her life who are planning to destroy her house, and God knows best. As for a married woman, who sees that she is eating mouse meat, this is a sign of her practicing gossip and slandering others, and God knows best. The presence of mice in the married woman’s bed. A sign of problems and disagreements with the husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing mice in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man who sees in a dream that he is hitting a mouse and killing it is a sign that he is a strong person and can solve his problems and crises. The vision also indicates that he will receive a lot of kindness and nourishment in the years Next. If a man sees that he is walking with mice in a dream, this is an indication that they accompany bad people and must be kept away from them. When a merchant dreams of seeing large mice, it is a metaphor for losing money, and God knows best. The appearance of fat mice in a man’s dream indicates that he suffers from hypocrisy. And deception is from the people closest to him, and God knows best. Seeing a rat bite in a person’s dream means that he is suffering from a disease, and God knows best. The appearance of mice in a man’s dream indicates sadness, distress, and enemy. Read also: Interpretation of a mouse in a dream by Ibn Siri
